question: Which data science professionals have shared insights about cloud technologies in their LinkedIn posts while working at companies investing heavily in tech partnerships?

subtasks.task: Identify LinkedIn posts related to cloud technologies. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
Filter for data science professionals who authored these posts. [PersonaUser]
Identify companies that are investing heavily in tech partnerships. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
Match the data science professionals with their companies to see if they are part of those investing in tech partnerships. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
